verses.verse: <S%H3588>If<s%> there be a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and they <S%H5066>come<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> that the <S%H8199>judges<s%> may <S%H8199>judge<s%> them; then they shall <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H7561>condemn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

And it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man be <S%H1121>worthy<s%> to be <S%H5221>beaten,<s%> that the <S%H8199>judge<s%> shall cause him to <S%H5307>lie<s%> down, and to be <S%H5221>beaten<s%> before his face, <S%H1767>according<s%> to his <S%H7564>fault,<s%> by a certain <S%H4557>number.<s%>

<S%H705>Forty<s%> <S%H5221>stripes<s%> he may give him, and not <S%H3254>exceed:<s%> <S%H6435>lest,<s%> if he should <S%H3254>exceed,<s%> and <S%H5221>beat<s%> him <S%H5921>above<s%> these with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4347>stripes,<s%> then your <S%H251>brother<s%> should <S%H7034>seem<s%> <S%H7034>vile<s%> to you.
You shall not <S%H2629>muzzle<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> when he <S%H1758>treads<s%> out the corn.

<S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H4191>die,<s%> and have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>child,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall not <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> to a <S%H376>stranger:<s%> <S%H2114><s%> her <S%H2993>husband's<s%> <S%H2993>brother<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to her, and <S%H3947>take<s%> her to him to <S%H802>wife,<s%> and perform the duty of an <S%H2992>husband's<s%> <S%H2992>brother<s%> to her.

And it shall be, that the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> which she <S%H3205>bears<s%> shall <S%H6965>succeed<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> which is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> be not <S%H4229>put<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2654>like<s%> not to <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H2994>brother's<s%> <S%H2994>wife,<s%> then let his <S%H2994>brother's<s%> <S%H2994>wife<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> My <S%H2993>husband's<s%> <S%H2993>brother<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H6965>raise<s%> up to his <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he <S%H14>will<s%> not perform the duty of my <S%H2992>husband's<s%> <S%H2992>brother.<s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> him, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him: and if he <S%H5975>stand<s%> to it, and <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H2654>like<s%> not to <S%H3947>take<s%> her;

Then shall his <S%H2994>brother's<s%> <S%H2994>wife<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> to him in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and <S%H2502>loose<s%> his <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> his <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H3417>spit<s%> in his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3602>So<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to that <S%H376>man<s%> that will not <S%H1129>build<s%> up his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H1004>house<s%> of him that has his <S%H5275>shoe<s%> <S%H2502>loosed.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5327>strive<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> with <S%H251>another,<s%> and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> draws <S%H7126>near<s%> for to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that <S%H5221>smites<s%> him, and <S%H7971>puts<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2388>takes<s%> him by the <S%H4016>secrets:<s%>
Then you shall <S%H7112>cut<s%> off her <S%H3709>hand,<s%> your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> her.
You shall not <S%H1961>have<s%> in your <S%H3599>bag<s%> divers <S%H68>weights,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> and a <S%H6996>small.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1961>have<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> divers <S%H374>measures,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> and a <S%H6996>small.<s%>

But you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> and <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weight,<s%> a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> and <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> shall you <S%H1961>have:<s%> that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>lengthened<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

For <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> things, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteously,<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to you by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when you were <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

<S%H834>How<s%> he <S%H7136>met<s%> you by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and smote the <S%H2179>hindmost<s%> of you, even <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H2826>feeble<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> you, when you were <S%H5889>faint<s%> and <S%H3023>weary;<s%> and he <S%H3373>feared<s%> not <S%H430>God.<s%>

Therefore it shall be, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, that you shall <S%H4229>blot<s%> out the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> you shall not <S%H7911>forget<s%> it.
